Uses of Class
com.cyberfront.crdt.operation.Operation

  • Packages that use Operation 
    Package Description
    com.cyberfront.crdt
    The com.cyberfront.crdt package includes the core classes to build and manage a commutative CRDT for managing JSON document updates using the JSON Patch standard.
    com.cyberfront.crdt.operation  
    com.cyberfront.crdt.sample.simulation
    The com.cyberfront.crdt.sample.simulation contains a collection of classes which are intended to perform stress testing on the functionality of the commutative CRDT implementation specified elsewhere in the class library.
